code: import*as React from'react';export var SocialMedia;(function(SocialMedia){SocialMedia["Facebook"]="facebook";SocialMedia["Twitter"]="twitter";SocialMedia["Pinterest"]="pinterest";SocialMedia["Mail"]="mail";SocialMedia["Linkedin"]="linkedin";SocialMedia["Customization"]="customization";})(SocialMedia||(SocialMedia={}));export const SocialMediaComponent=props=>{const openWindowFunc=event=>{return setShareLinks(props);};const src=props.src&&props.src.src;return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("img",{onClick:openWindowFunc,src:src,alt:props.socialMediaName||props.socialMedia,title:props.socialMediaName||props.socialMedia});};const setShareLinks=props=>{const pageUrl=encodeURIComponent(props.postUrl);const mediaImage=document.getElementsByName('twitter:image')[0].getAttribute('content');let url;switch(props.socialMedia){case SocialMedia.Facebook:url="https://www.facebook.com/sharer.php?u=".concat(pageUrl);break;case SocialMedia.Twitter:url="https://twitter.com/share?url=".concat(pageUrl).concat(props.postTitle?"&text=".concat(props.postTitle):'');break;case SocialMedia.Pinterest:url="https://www.pinterest.com/pin/create/button/?url=".concat(pageUrl).concat(mediaImage?"&media=".concat(mediaImage):'').concat(props.postTitle?"&description=".concat(props.postTitle):'');break;case SocialMedia.Mail:url="mailto:?body=Check%20out%20this%20site:".concat(pageUrl).concat(props.postTitle?"&subject=".concat(props.postTitle):'');break;case SocialMedia.Linkedin:url="https://www.linkedin.com/shareArticle?mini=true&url=".concat(pageUrl).concat(props.postTitle?"&title=".concat(props.postTitle):'');break;case SocialMedia.Customization:url=props.socialShareURL&&"".concat(props.socialShareURL).concat(pageUrl);break;default:}url&&openWindow(url);};function openWindow(url){const left=(screen.width-570)/2;const top=(screen.height-570)/2;const params="menubar=no,toolbar=no,status=no,width=570,height=570,top='".concat(top,"',left='").concat(left);window.open(url,'NewWindow',params);}
